Title: Basic Sandwich
Plot: When everyone learns about Greendale's first dean, they embark on a mission to find his old computer lab; Subway enlists Chang to spy on the group as part of its plan to take over the school.
GuestStars: Jonathan Banks, Chris Elliott, John Oliver, James M. Connor, Saginaw Grant, Dino Stamatopoulos, Jeremy Scott Johnson, Brady Novak, Patrick Babbitt, Lauren Anderson, Antonio Ferris
